main event: Observers watched an oval shaped object rise from the ground and hover in the sky, observed for 20 minutes before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as sky blue in color,It was observed to be stationary at times,Two witnesses confirmed seeing the object,The observers had visual confirmation through a telescope,The object was reported to have moved very slowly but had moments of sudden acceleration.
witness description: Students from Campbell High School, ages around 14, who observed the object while playing outside.
